clientDef.name: Dragon
clientDef.description: Dragons like to live in caves, sleep on treasure hordes, and repose in a charred forest.
clientDef.trait: Dragons love to horde, and get a bonus for taking items that would give a bonus to another player.

clientDef.name: Queen
clientDef.description: Queens live to live in castles, sleep in overstuffed beds, and throw tea parties in a hedge maze.
clientDef.trait: The Queen has superior appreciation for aesthetics. She receives double bonus (or penalty!) for theme.

clientDef.name: Ghost
clientDef.description: Ghosts like to live in run-down shacks, sleep in the attic, and relax in a swamp.
clientDef.trait: Ghosts have few physical needs, and earn no penalty for failing to secure any item type.

interestDef.name: Bookish
interestDef.description: This client is an avid reader, and likes to spend time indoors.
